nodes.text: Super-hyperroutes were types of hyperspace routes that served as the primary routes of the galaxy. Such hyperspace routes were the Corellian Run, Corellian Trade Spine, Hydian Way, Perlemian Trade Route, and Rimma Trade Route, which stretched throughout much of the galaxy.

Super-hyperroutes were first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the twenty-ninth issue of the Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon magazine. Super-hyperroutes were originally mentioned in the Star Wars Legends in The Essential Atlas, a 2009 reference book authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace.
